description: The Ocean Biodiversity Information System (OBIS) is a global open-access data platform that provides information on the distribution and abundance of marine life. Operating as a program under UNESCO's Intergovernmental Oceanographic Commission (IOC-UNESCO), OBIS integrates biodiversity data from over 30 regional and thematic nodes worldwide, making millions of marine species occurrence records freely available for research, conservation, and sustainable ocean management.
name: OBIS
